manifestDescription.message: Automatically enforces user consent preferences for browser cookies.
manifestDescription.description: Description of the extension in the manifest.

firstTimeSubtitle.description: Subtitle of the first time setup page.

firstTimeGreeting.description: Greeting message on the first time setup.

optionsGreeting.description: Greeting message on the options page.

optionsDescriptionPG1.message: CookieBlock allows you to automatically delete cookies that are used for purposes you do not consent towards. This is done independently of the website you visit. The categories are listed below.
optionsDescriptionPG1.description: Description paragraph 1 seen on the options page.

optionsDescriptionPG2.message: Note that CookieBlock is experimental and still in development. The categorization is not completely accurate, hence it may occur that an essential cookie is removed, breaking website functionality. If this is the case, try to add an exception for that website, or increase the bias for necessary cookies. In the worst case, you can pause the removal of cookies temporarily.
optionsDescriptionPG2.description: Description paragraph 2 seen on the options page.

feedbackPG1.message: Do you want to report a broken website or give us feedback? Then please use the following form:
feedbackPG1.description: Feedback text pointing towards the Google Forms survey.

feedbackPG2.message: Or alternatively, send us a mail to the following email address:
feedbackPG2.description: Feedback text pointing towards the email.

feedbackPG3.message: We would greatly appreciate feedback on all aspects of the extension.
feedbackPG3.description: Description paragraph 3 seen on the options page.

firstTimeDescPG1.message: CookieBlock allows you to automatically delete cookies that are used for purposes you did not consent towards. This is done independently of the website you visit. It uses an automated machine-learning classifier to assign the cookies to a predefined set of categories, which you can choose from below.
firstTimeDescPG1.description: Description paragraph 1 seen on the first time setup page.

firstTimeDescPG2.message: Note that CookieBlock is experimental and still in development. It may occur that essential website functionality is broken by the automatic removal of cookies. If this is the case, try to add an exception for that website, or increase the bias for necessary cookies. Alternatively, you can pause the removal of cookies temporarily.
firstTimeDescPG2.description: Description paragraph 2 seen on the first time setup page.

firstTimeDescPG3.message: We would greatly appreciate feedback on all aspects of the extension.
firstTimeDescPG3.description: Description paragraph 3 seen on the first time setup page.

consentDescription.message: Select the categories of cookies that you consent towards:

catNecessaryDesc.message: Strictly necessary cookies are required for essential services of the website to operate. Some examples for this are login tokens which remember that a user is logged in, or cookies that keep track of the contents of a shopping cart. These cookies cannot be rejected, as doing so would cause websites to stop working correctly.

catFunctionalityDesc.message: Functionality cookies serve to remember optional user preferences, such as the style of the website. They are typically not required for essential services to function. However, we recommend enabling them to improve the user experience.

catAnalyticsDesc.message: Analytics cookies are used to collect statistical information about how visitors use a website. These cookies serve to measure and improve the site performance. In principle, they do not require sensitive, personal information to be collected, and can rely on anonymized data.

catAdvertisingDesc.message: Advertising cookies collect sensitive user data and track visitor actions across the web to display personalized advertisements. The data collected in this way may also be sold off to third-parties. To protect your privacy, we recommend rejecting consent for these types of cookies.

additionalOptionsDesc.message: Settings that adjust the extension behavior or trigger additional functions:

pauseCookieRemoval.description: Text for the cookie removal pause button.

pauseDescription.message: When enabled, stops the removal of cookies temporarily, but still outputs the classification into the browser console. Useful for debugging or stopping cookie removal in case a website breaks.

buttonExitSetup.description: Label for the close button on the first time setup

popupButtonOptions.description: Button for opening the options page

optionsHeaderConsent.description: Header for the consent category options

currentCookieEnforceTitle.description: Header for the policy enforcement button.

currentCookieEnforceDescription.message: Run the policy enforcement on all cookies currently stored by the browser. This will remove all cookies that are assigned to categories you did not consent to.
currentCookieEnforceDescription.description: Description of the policy enforcement on current cookies.

currentCookieEnforceDescriptionSetup.message: This button will enforce the policy you selected on all cookies currently stored in the browser and close the setup window. This will remove any cookies that you did not consent towards.
currentCookieEnforceDescriptionSetup.description: Description of the policy enforcement on current cookies.

currentCookieEnforceButton.description: Label on the button that performs the current cookie classification.

currentCookieProgressMsg.description: Message that appears after classifier was applied.

currentCookieEnforceMsg.description: Message that appears after classifier was applied.

globalExceptionsHeader.description: Header for the global extensions listing.

globalExceptionsDescription.message: Cookies that originate from the domains in this list will always be permitted, regardless of the current cookie consent policy. Use this to add exceptions to domains you trust, or if website functionality breaks.
globalExceptionsDescription.description: Decription for the global website exceptions.

exceptionPlaceholderText.description: Text for the exception domain entry fields.

functionalExceptionsDescription.message: Do not reject Functionality Cookies that stem from the following domains:

analyticsExceptionsDescription.message: Do not reject Analytics Cookies that stem from the following domains:

advertExceptionsDescription.message: Do not reject Advertising Cookies that stem from the following domains:

addButton.description: Text on button for adding exceptions

categoryStatisticsDesc.message: Number of unique cookies currently stored in the history, separated by category. Click on any of the items to open the current cookie storage for that label in JSON format.

popupErrorTextRemove.description: Error message when trying to remove exception.

popupErrorTextAdd.description: Error message when trying to add exception.

defaultDescription.message: This button restores the default settings of the extension.
defaultDescription.description: Description for the restore defaults button.

defaultApplyText.description: Defaults restored message that appears after clicking the button.

clearDataTitle.description: Title for the 'clear cookie data' button.

clearDataDescription.message: This button deletes the current cookie history. It does not remove cookies from the browser itself!
clearDataDescription.description: Description for the 'clear cookie data' button.

clearDataText.description: Message that appears after hitting the clear data button.

sliderDescription.message: This slider adjusts how commonly CookieBlock will assign cookies to the 'Strictly Necessary' class. Higher values will make CookieBlock decide on the 'Necessary' category more often. Increasing this can reduce website breakage at the cost of classification precision.

applyErrorText.description: Error message if something goes wrong with the buttons.

historyConsentTitle.description: Description for the cookie history consent toggle.

historyConsentDesc.message: By enabling this option, you consent to collection of a separate history of cookies, including updates to said cookies. This history is entirely local and never leaves the extension storage. Enabling this option allows the cookie classifier to make more informed decisions, and it allows the extension to recognize previously removed cookies, preventing repeat classification. If disabled, the classifier will always reclassify each cookie based on the current contents.
historyConsentDesc.description: Description for the cookie history consent checkbox.

cookieHistoryButtonLabel.description: Label for the button to view the entire cookie history.
